ValidationRule.description: proposal manager can only change state from draft to ready to convert or cancel.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( ISCHANGED(Upsell_Status__c), OR( $Permission.SWX_CCRE_Proposal_Manager, $Permission.SWX_CCRE_Solution_Manager), OR( ISPICKVAL(Upsell_Status__c,"Convert"), ISPICKVAL(Upsell_Status__c,"Reject")))
ValidationRule.errorMessage: your role does not allow you to perform this action
